content: materials - 2 skeins of purl soho s fiddlehead 2 100% alpaca each skein is 65 yards/ 100g approximately 130 yards required we used the colors ocean air heirloom white northern spruce spring onion and aqua celadon note some colors may no longer be available - us 13 9 mm 16-inch circular needles 3 or size needed for gauge - a removable stitch marker 4 - optional spare needle us 13 or smaller for 3-needle bind off gauge 8 stitches and 12 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch size finished dimensions 6½ inches wide x 33 inches long designed by purl soho designer hiromi glover 7 click here 8 to see even more of hiromi s work 2 https //www purlsoho com/fiddlehead html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/2023/11/13/fiddlehead-bundle-in-new-colors/ 7 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 8 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
